domain.title: Domain
domain.description: Domain name from StackExchange to scrape.

name.title: Name
name.description: ZIM name. Used as identifier and filename (date will be appended). Constructed from domain if not supplied

title.title: Title
title.description: Custom title for your ZIM. Site name otherwise

description.title: Description
description.description: Custom description for your ZIM. Site tagline otherwise

favicon.title: Favicon
favicon.description: URL for Favicon. Site square logo otherwise

creator.title: Creator
creator.description: Name of content creator. Stack Exchange otherwise

publisher.title: Publisher
publisher.description: Custom publisher name (ZIM metadata). openZIM otherwise

tags.title: ZIM Tags
tags.description: A semicolon (;) delimited list of tags to add to the ZIM. Scraper generic flags (category:stack_exchange, stack_exchange, ... are always added automatically)

without_images.title: Without Images
without_images.description: Don't include images (in-post images, user icons). Faster.

without_user_profiles.title: Without User Profiles
without_user_profiles.description: Don't include user profile pages. Faster

without_user_identicons.title: Without Identicons
without_user_identicons.description: Don't include user's profile pictures. Replaced by generated ones. Faster

without_external_links.title: Without External links
without_external_links.description: Remove all external links from posts and user profiles. Link text is kept but not the address. Slower

without_unanswered.title: Without Unanswered
without_unanswered.description: Don't include posts that have zero answer. Faster

without_users_links.title: Without Users Links
without_users_links.description: Remove "user links" completely. Remove both url and text for a selected list of "social" websites. Slower

without_names.title: Without Names
without_names.description: Replace usernames in posts with generated ones

censor_words_list.title: Words black list
censor_words_list.description: URL to a text file containing one word per line. Each of them to be removed from all content. Very slow.

output.title: Output folder
output.description: Output folder for ZIM file(s). Leave it as `/output`

threads.title: Threads
threads.description: Number of threads to use to handle tasks concurrently. Increase to speed-up I/O operations (disk, network). Default: 1

tmp_dir.title: Temp folder
tmp_dir.description: Where to create temporay build folder. Leave it as `/output`

zim_file.title: ZIM filename
zim_file.description: ZIM file name (based on --name if not provided). Include {period} to insert date period dynamically

optimization_cache.title: Optimization Cache URL
optimization_cache.description: S3 Storage URL including credentials and bucket

mirror.title: Mirror
mirror.description: URL from which to download compressed XML dumps

stats_filename.title: Stats filename
stats_filename.description: Scraping progress file. Leave it as `/output/task_progress.json`

redis_url.title: Redis URL
redis_url.description: Redis URL to use as database. Keep it as unix:///var/run/redis.sock

keep_redis.title: Keep redis
keep_redis.description: Don't flush redis DB on exit. Keep it enabled.
